p: Afterwards, wellness parameters including appearance of mucous membrane, eyes, skin fur, salivation, convulsions, lethargy, coma, sleep, diarrhea, tremors, body weight deviation, and mortality were monitored and recorded after 30 minutes, 1 hour, 4 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours, 7 days, and 14 days respectively [ 23]. The same procedure was adopted for a 550 mg/kg bw dose and for the cut-off dose of 2000 mg/kg bw [ 23].
